amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to provide assistance to Pakistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 59 printed in House Report 113-170 to prohibit any funds in the bill from being provided to Pakistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A053) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A053) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
